author: A D
text:
Tamil Nadu Government College Teachers’ Association (TNGCTA), which is opposing the relocation of 325 Annamalai University Teachers to different government arts colleges across the State, says it will observe fast in Chennai on February 13 if government was not coming forward to talks.

TNGCTA zonal president G. Elango told The Hindu that gate meetings opposing the move have been held in all the five government arts and science colleges in Vellore region on Friday for second day.

“Principals were instructed that even if the relocated teachers have not completed either NET/SLET or Ph.D. they may be allowed to work. We oppose this and we will observe fast if government is not willing to relent,” he said.

‘It will be held in Chennai on February 13 if government fails to come for talks’
title: College teachers to observe fast opposing relocation of lecturers
